comments:
This does not seem urgent, I don't think there are any bad side effects, but I 
saw the following exception logged while shutting down the latest RAD build 
(built on 3.0.1).

Class cast exceptions within eclipse code should never happen, right?

Do any of them do anything weird like changing their site.
See bug 75051 for more details, and reply there.
